plays.text: Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Hooking Dallas Eakins
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Interference Brian Willsie
Penalty to Dallas Eakins 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Willsie
Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Parker

Penalty to Scott Parker 2 minutes for Roughing Jeff Cowan
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Slashing Robyn Regehr
Goal scored by Denis Gauthier assisted by Clarke Wilm
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Boarding Shjon Podein
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Dean McAmmond and Robyn Regehr
